Name: BgmChangeArea
Notes: Changes the background music using the stage's music information in StageBgmInfo. Supports several changing modes.

Obj_arg1.Name: Argument 1
Obj_arg1.Description:
If Obj_arg0 is set to 0: Column ID in StageBgmInfo.
If Obj_arg0 is set to 1: Fade time.
If Obj_arg0 is set to 2: ChangeBgmState ID in StageBgmInfo.

Values.Notes: Obj_arg0 is set to 0: value -1 will mute the music.

Obj_arg2.Name: Argument 2
Obj_arg2.Description:
If Obj_arg0 is set to 1: Column ID in StageBgmInfo.
If Obj_arg0 is set to 2: Fade time.

Values.Notes: Obj_arg0 is set to 1: value -1 will mute the music.

Obj_arg3.Name: Comet Music Type
Obj_arg3.Description: Sets how music changes are handled during Comet missions.

Values.Notes: Music change is ignored during Comet
Music change is enforced during Comet

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.

SW_B.Description: Invalidates this area if this switch gets activated. However, this only works in "TwisterTowerGalaxy".

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.
